name: Spirited Away Fan Game
description:
Welcome to the world of Spirited Away. I've always been a fan of Hayao Miyazaki and I'm sure if your here, you have been too.  This game is still in development so expect this description to change over time.  The game is developed in RPG MAKERMV, and allows you to solve puzzles currently to advance your progress.  I'm also currently working on fixing multiple smaller issues adding my own tile sets and animations.  

The game can work through both point and click. As well as using the arrow keys to go throughout the game.
